ValidationRule.description: Users cannot edit a closed HR record
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Status__c), "Closed"), $User.Override_Validation_Rules__c = False, $User.DelegatedPowerUserAccess__c = False, $Profile.Name <> "System Administrator", $Profile.Name <> "PGi Global Service Desk", $Profile.Name <> "PGi Human Resources Support", $Profile.Name <> "PGi Technical Support" )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot edit a closed record.
